detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with quilted details, zips in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dress in a silk weave with a concealed zip at the back with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the top. Short trumpet sleeves and a tie belt at the waist. Lined.

Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Adjustable straps that fasten at the front, ribbed side sections, a kangaroo pocket with appliqués and a print motif, and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a premium cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Dress in a patterned modal crêpe weave with a seam at the waist, decorative bow at the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short-sleeved blouse in lace with a smocked stand-up collar, small opening and button at the back of the neck, and a frill-trimmed yoke at the front. Unlined.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of trousers in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a ribbed neckline and a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and covered elastication at the hems.
Short, high-waisted skirt in suede with decorative seams. Visible zip and a concealed button at the back. Lined.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with an elastic strap over the foot and a decorative bow at the front. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

V-neck blouse in a patterned weave with a wrapover front with a concealed button and hook-and-eye fastening, and narrow tie at the side. Long sleeves with decorative pleats and buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Press-studs on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).

Trousers woven in a cool linen blend with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Relaxed fit with a regular waist, fake fly and tapered legs.

Top in soft, patterned viscose jersey with flounces. V-neck, a flounce-trimmed, sewn-in wrapover at the front and an elasticated seam and tie belt at the waist. 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Short A-line skirt.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short sleeves with ribbed trims.
Cardigan in soft, textured-knit cotton with glittery buttons down the front and patch pockets.
Relaxed-fit blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in soft viscose jersey with double spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Padded jacket with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Hi-tops in mesh with a padded shaft, elasticated lacing and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Skirt in checked cotton flannel containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Sleeveless. straight-cut top in woven fabric with broderie anglaise at the hem.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in woven fabric with a high, elasticated paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Side pockets, fly with a concealed zip, and short, wide legs.
Gloves in soft leather with a soft, fine-knit lining.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with a zip fly and button and slim legs.
Ankle-length trousers in imitation leather. High waist, zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening and pleats at the top. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Metal hair clips decorated with fabric butterflies. Length 3.5 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper in a rib knit with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.

Short-sleeved lace dress with a decorative bow on the front and cap sleeves. Zip at the back, narrow elastication at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Jersey-lined bodice and a sewn-in inner skirt.
Set with two hair clips and a pair of earrings. Hair clips in various designs in metal and plastic. Length 6.4 and 8 cm. Earrings in embossed metal with rectangular pendants. Length of earrings 4 cm.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Wide, cropped jersey T-shirt with a print motif on the front.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, frill trim, ties at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Sleeveless lace top in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps that are lace-covered at the back. Low-cut back and ties at the back of the neck. Jersey-lined front.
Fully lined sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front, narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and an elastic hem.
Trainers in jersey with imitation leather sections, elasticated lacing and a tongue with an appliqué on the front. Padded edge and a grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Shorts in silk satin with an elasticated waist and lace details.
Joggers in soft, patterned jersey with an elastication and a sewn-on bow at the waist, frill-trimmed fake front pockets and elasticated hems.

Short dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Round neckline, opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with an organza flounce on the inside of the shoulders to create a puff effect. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a draped skirt. Satin lining.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Fabric hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.

LIMITED EDITION. Dress in softly draping, jacquard-weave viscose with gathered seams on the shoulders and short, flared sleeves. Double layer at the top with long ties that wrap over at the top and fasten at the waist. Visible seam at the front and a flare to the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a motif.
Swim trousers and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with short raglan sleeves and a small collar. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Calf-length skirt in an airy viscose weave with a wrapover front and high waist with concealed press-studs and ties at one side. Unlined.
Short skirt in a cotton weave with a high, frill-trimmed paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Zip fly and button and front and back pockets. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in textured plumeti jersey with a deep V-neck with gathers at the top and a straight-cut hem.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back with sections in ventilating mesh and a wide elastic hem. Medium support.
Boxer shorts in stretch, fast-drying, breathable, functional fabric with wide elastication at the waist and slightly longer legs.
Ankle boots with a loop at the back. Heel 4 cm.
Cardigan in a soft, textured cotton knit with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pattern-knit jumper in a wool blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Treggings in sturdy cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short skirt in stretch cotton twill with a high waist, visible button fly and patch front pockets. Unlined.

Jeans in washed stretch denim that are lighter at the front with a regular waist, button fly, front pockets, back pockets and a darker section where a torn-off coin pocket has been. Skinny legs with twisted seams and ripped seams at the hems.
Straight-cut top in velvet containing some silk with a V-neck and short flared sleeves with decorative gathers at the shoulders.
Ankle-length, pull-on trousers in an airy weave with a regular, elasticated waist, welt side pockets and fake back pockets. Loose fit with a fake fly and tapered legs with creases.
Fully lined swimsuits with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. One with an all-over print.
Top in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with a drawstring at the front. Seam with a flounce at the hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Wide, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with side pockets and wide elastication with a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Trousers in soft patterned twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, frill-trimmed side pockets and elasticated hems.
Off-the-shoulder top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps, short sleeves and elastication and a flounce at the top and sleeve-ends.
Hooded jacket in soft pile with a zip down the front with a chin guard and a jersey trim around the hood, down the front and at the cuffs and hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Pyjama bottoms in a cool, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and straight, wide legs.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.

Ankle-length suit trousers in soft stretch jersey with an extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique. Slightly shorter legs that are close-fitting at the thighs and knees and taper to the hems to create a flattering silhouette.

Oxford cotton shirt in a straight, gently tapered fit with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (no press-stud in sizes 1-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless top in lightly crêped jersey with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with a seam centre front and at the heels. Imitation leather insoles.
Fitted jumper in a rib-knit viscose blend with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
